## EntityManager.getSelectFields() method

获取选择字段集

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSelectFields(orm: EntityConfig, isField?: boolean): string[] | string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  orm | [EntityConfig](./relaen.entityconfig.md) | 实体配置 |
|  isField | boolean | _(Optional)_ 默认返回属性名，true返回数据库字段字符串 |

**Returns:**

string\[\] \| string

字段集
